sentences.en: A drowning man will clutch at a straw.
sentences.cn: 即将溺死的人连一根草也要去抓.

sentences.en: a single dried stem of straw
Glass should be packed in straw.
sentences.cn: 玻璃器皿应该包扎在稻草中.

sentences.en: his affair was the last straw.
sentences.cn: 他的风流事是最终导致失败的因素。

sentences.en: I don't care a straw for your opinions.
sentences.cn: 我一点都不在乎你有什么看法.

sentences.en: I know that you'refloundering around, trying to grasp at any straw.
sentences.cn: 我知道你正不知所措，是在病急乱投医。

sentences.en: I sat on a bale of straw near the fire.
sentences.cn: 我坐在炉火边的一捆稻草上.

sentences.en: I wouldn't be seen dead in a straw hat.
Making me work late on Friday was the last straw.
sentences.cn: 要我周五加班到很晚终于让我不堪忍受了。

sentences.en: May I have a straw for my drink?
sentences.cn: 给我一根喝饮料的吸管好 吗 ?

sentences.en: She nestled the eggs safely in the straw in Jim's basket.
sentences.cn: 她把鸡蛋轻轻地放在吉姆篮子里的稻草上。

sentences.en: She protected her head with a wide-brimmed straw-hat.
sentences.cn: 她戴了一顶宽边草帽保护头部。

sentences.en: She sipped her lemonade through a straw.
The bumblebee sizzed right under his straw hat.
sentences.cn: 大黄蜂就在他的草帽底下丝丝作声.

sentences.en: The floors are covered with woven straw mats.
sentences.cn: 地板上铺着编织的草垫。

sentences.en: The horses were crunching their straw at their manger.
sentences.cn: 这些马在嘎吱嘎吱地吃槽里的草.

sentences.en: The old peasant is twisting pieces of straw into a rope.
sentences.cn: 这位老农民正把稻草搓成绳子.

sentences.en: The special cabinet committee comprises Mr Brown, Mr Mandelson, and Mr Straw.
sentences.cn: 特别内阁委员会包括布朗先生、曼德尔森先生和斯特劳先生。

words.tran_cn: 琐事,不中用,不值钱的东西,微粒,斑点

phrases.tran_cn: （预示将来发展的）迹象，预兆，苗头
捞救命稻草，作最后的绝望挣扎
抽到下下签（尤指被选中去执行倒霉任务）
最终使人无法忍受的一击；终于导致失败的因素

trans.tran_cn: 稻草，麦秆，吸管，毫无价值的东西
trans.tran_en: the last problem in a series of problems that finally makes you give up, get angry etc
